citations.narrative:
There was a large amount of frost noted in two chest freezers (along the top edge of the walls next to the door) and in one
upright freezer (along the front edge of the freezer shelves next to the door). The 3 freezers are used to store frozen food
supplies for the raptors.
Per this Section, supplies of food must be stored in a manner that prevents deterioration of its nutritive value. The
presence of a large amount of frost in freezers results from warm air entering the freezer, such as from not shutting the
door tightly or from an incomplete seal of the door with the door gasket, and can affect the quality of the food stored
within. The facility needs to address the large amount of frost present in the food storage freezers to prevent any
deterioration of the food supplies. Correct by 10/20/25.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
*END OF REPORT*
n

narrative:
3.150(e) 
   
Facilities, general. 
There was a large amount of frost noted in two chest freezers (along the top edge of the walls next to the door) and in one 
upright freezer (along the front edge of the freezer shelves next to the door). The 3 freezers are used to store frozen food 
supplies for the raptors.  
 
Per this Section, supplies of food must be stored in a manner that prevents deterioration of its nutritive value. The 
presence of a large amount of frost in freezers results from warm air entering the freezer, such as from not shutting the 
door tightly or from an incomplete seal of the door with the door gasket, and can affect the quality of the food stored 
within. The facility needs to address the large amount of frost present in the food storage freezers to prevent any 
deterioration of the food supplies. Correct by 10/20/25. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
*END OF REPORT* 
 
 n
